entry.title: Flood Watch issued July 29 at 1:49AM MST until July 30 at 12:00AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: .Monsoonal moisture in place over the region will lead to numerous thunderstorms through Friday...especially during the afternoon and evening hours. Storms will produce heavy rainfall leading to flash flooding. This risk will be greatest for burn scars, but several roads could also experience flooding. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT...

entry.title: Fire Weather Watch issued July 29 at 3:33PM HST until July 31 at 6:00PM HST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FOR SUNDAY... .The combination of dry fuels, strong and gusty trade winds and low relative humidity could produce extreme fire behavior on Sunday, especially during the afternoon hours. Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and be difficult to control. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT ON SUNDAY FOR LEEWARD SIDES
